resources.string: I am a fully professional creative Solution Architect in .Net/Java Solutions and Web & Analist Developer Involving with latest designing solutions and technologies is a great feel free to contact creative.
Working on solutions to clients from Altran from Java to AngularJs

I have been working in Portugal since 2006 to 2016, in following areas - services, billing, innovation, transports, financial markets, Marketing Digital, bank and construction. Technology used are - .Net Platform (2.0 to 4.6), Java Platform, Android Platform, programming languages C#, Javascript, Html, WCF and others. With integration to SQL Server (T-SQL) and various tools for scripting and IIS. In the last years I have explored the Cloud Computing and SOA architectures on self-studying. In the past 2 years I have the team leader of projects on agile methodologies and scrum methods. Simultaneously, I have been developing my skills in the Cloud Computing with the self-learning of the Azure Platform and Courses online of the Microsoft Academy. In the past 2 years, I have worked as a former, project and team manager, and have been responsible for the course of Asp.Net and Azure Integration. I can work on different projects in parallel always focusing on the quality of my work. I\'m keen on everything I do and always expect the best from myself. I also try to keep up to date as much as possible through constant trainings. I am a communicative person and try to deal as better as possible with any person.
